post.author: 강동욱
post.content:
우리 회사 에서 co-op을 하고 떠나는 대학생이 남기는 글 임다.

Hi everyone,


Today is my last day.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank the XXX team for an enjoyable and at the same time useful and educational
work term. I had an amazing time and learned a lot. A special thanks to Johne for patiently answering all my questions and
Shawn for providing me with the opportunity.

I wish you all the best of luck and success with the product. You have managed to combine a great idea with a great team
and I am sure the business will come.


Thank you,



그리고 또 어떤 놈이 덧붙혀서.. 쓰길...

What he said.

Seriously though, I had a good time this summer with all you guys.  Never have I had the opportunity to work with so many smart people.  Some of you may know that I commute from more than an hour away to come here daily, and the weird thing is, I never minded coming in to work at all.  Now there's some cheese fries, for you.  All you talented guys writing that big awesome app really made me feel like, well less of a boy.  I learned alot this summer.

I hope you guys don't forget your roots, and always remember how much of your success is based on, you know, the guy by the kitchen with the earphones.  

I'll be in school for the next year, then who knows what?

You can reach me there at XXXX@XXXXXX.ca

Best of luck,

XXXX



그냥 가볍게 읽어 보시길...  여기서 태어나서 자란 아그들이 쓴글이니..

강동욱
post.title: (3) 실무 영어 - 현지 오피스 메일
